amendatorysection.catchline: Levees; dikes; assessments; entry on tax list; lien.
amendatorysection.para: The board of supervisors or county commissioners shall thereupon cause the assessment so made upon the lands benefited as aforesaid to be entered upon the tax lists of the county as provided in cases of special assessments, which assessment shall constitute a lien on the real estate respectively assessed and shall be collected as other special assessments are collected; Provided, that one-tenth of each assessment shall be collected each year for a period of ten years with interest at the rate of seven percent per annum on deferred payments, unless paid in full as herein provided.
